amendment.description: To allocate amounts for the Intimate Partner Violence Assistance Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3431 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3431 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 3411.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3431 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
